name: CYPEST Underground
description: As a computer virus you are infiltrating various servers and avoid their defense systems to reach the CPU. Collect secret files and folders to land as high as possible in the highscore list.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 560 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 670M Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2
